testcase.name: Test to access Login - Logout Activity page with Login Activity link from All Activity Logs menu
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser go to url "adminUrl".....................................passed Then Admin enters an "adminBoraMail", a "password" and then clicks sign in link on admin page to login.passed Then Admin clicks All Activity Logs and Activity Logs links in Dashboard....passed Then Admin verifies accessing Login - Logout Activity page from All Activity Logs menu.passed And Closes the page.........................................................passed

testcase.name: Test of deletion of activities in Login/Logout Activity list with Celan All button
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser go to url "adminUrl".....................................passed Then Admin enters an "adminBoraMail", a "password" and then clicks sign in link on admin page to login.passed Then Admin clicks All Activity Logs and Activity Logs links in Dashboard....passed Then Admin verifies that activities in Login - Logout Activity list are deleted with Celan All button.passed And Closes the page.........................................................passed

testcase.name: Test for listing activities in Login/Logout Activity list with User, Login AT, Logout AT, IP, Agent, Description headers
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser go to url "adminUrl".....................................passed Then Admin enters an "adminBoraMail", a "password" and then clicks sign in link on admin page to login.passed Then Admin clicks All Activity Logs and Activity Logs links in Dashboard....passed Then Admin verifies that the activities in the Login-Logout Activity list are the titles for which they are listed.passed And Closes the page.........................................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given Open browser go to url "adminUrl".....................................passed Then Admin enters an "adminBoraMail", a "password" and then clicks sign in link on admin page to login.passed Then Admin clicks All Activity Logs and Activity Logs links in Dashboard....passed Then Admin verifies that it is possible to search Login - Logout Activity list with Quick Search Text Box.passed And Closes the page.........................................................passed
